Package Server

Class ModelTranslator

java.lang.Object
Server.ModelTranslator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerControllerInterface, Traslator
public class ModelTranslator extends Object implements ServerControllerInterface
The translator between the controller and the web structure

  • Method Details

    • initializeGameState

      public void initializeGameState()
      Decks and open cards are created, also each player is given his initial hand of cards (the view will display it only later)
      Specified by:
      initializeGameState in interface ServerControllerInterface

    • setPlayerReady

      public void setPlayerReady()
      Each player once connected and inside a game sends a message(ReadyToPlayMessage) that calls this method: after all players sent this message the game finally starts with the starterCards distribution
      Specified by:
      setPlayerReady in interface ServerControllerInterface

    • playStarterCard

      public void playStarterCard(boolean face, String player)
      The controller places the starter card for the player with the specified face. A counter checks if all players placed their cards and then updates the State of the game
      Specified by:
      playStarterCard in interface ServerControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      face - the face of the starter card
      player - the nickname of the player

    • chooseSecretObjective

      public void chooseSecretObjective(String cardId, String player)
      sets the desired card as secretObjective for the player. A counter checks if all players chose their secretObjective
      Specified by:
      chooseSecretObjective in interface ServerControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      cardId - the id of the selected card
      player - nickname of the player

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int cardId, int x, int y, Boolean faceSide)
      all GameState attributes regarding the placement of a card are set and the card is placed
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface ServerControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      cardId - the id of the card we want to play
      x - the x value of the coordinates
      y - the y value of the coordinates
      faceSide - the side we want to play the card

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(int cardSource) throws RuntimeException
      we draw a card from the specified card source Also since this is the last performed action in a turn, we check if this is the last turn of the game
      Specified by:
      drawCard in interface ServerControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      cardSource - the deck to draw from: 1 if it is goldDeck, 2 if it is openGold with index 0, 3 if it is openGold with index 1, 4 if it is resourceDeck, 5 if it is openResource with index 0, 6 if it is openResource with index 1
      Throws:
      RuntimeException

    • checkMessage

      public boolean checkMessage(MessageFromClient message)
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the message is pertinent to the current turn state, false otherwise

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game.
      Specified by:
      endGame in interface ServerControllerInterface

    • setPlayerActive

      public void setPlayerActive(String playerName)
      Sets a player in an active state
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player to be set active

    • setPlayerInactive

      public void setPlayerInactive(String playerName)
      Sets a player in an inactive state If all the players except one are disconnected, after waiting the time specified, the game is closed Otherwise the game continues If the player is the initial player, it must be adjusted If the game is closed, the gameEnded boolean is set to true
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player to be set active

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection()
      Handles disconnection of a player.
